If it keeps saying trial has expired try this

WINKEY+R -> regedit -> HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE -> SOFTWARE -> Acoustica -> Mixcraft6

Find

bDisableBuyDialogDuringTrial
bHideBuyButton

change the value of these to 1
